remarks: The leading coefficient of a product of polynomials.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 24-Jul-2014.)
statement:
coefv0.1 $e |- A = ( coeff ` F ) $.
coeadd.2 $e |- B = ( coeff ` G ) $.
coemulhi.3 $e |- M = ( deg ` F ) $.
coemulhi.4 $e |- N = ( deg ` G ) $.
coemulhi $p |- ( ( F e. ( Poly ` S ) /\ G e. ( Poly ` S ) ) -> ( ( coeff ` ( F oF x. G ) ) ` ( M + N ) ) = ( ( A ` M ) x. ( B ` N ) ) ) $.
